OOC:

OK, let me set this whole mess straight.
I wasn't trying to tick anyone off or post something that I thought 
was in bad humor or taste.
I thought that the poem/song/story was OK.
It expressed what happened in NY in a different kind of view. It 
showed that no matter how hard we're hit, we will stick together and 
pull through. OK, so using  Dr, Suess may not have been the best 
thing, but the author did get the point across. No matter what, we as 
a nation is here to help each other when terrible things happen and 
that we can really pull through.  It wasn't ment to target anyone 
other than one imparticular individual, but that was obvious.
Other than that, I'm sorry. I thought perhaps you might find, not 
nessassarily humor, but at least get a smile at the job the author 
had done.  I thought it was well writen. And the point was still 
made, together we stand. Now and always. No matter what may come. 

Anyway, in the future, I shall not make the same mistake twice. I 
shall not post anything but RPG material on this message board. Once 
again, I'm sorry.

Logo. 

If you wish to respond, please PM me. Thank you.
